          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy in spring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie im Frühjahr</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie au printemps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia na mola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia in primavera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια την άνοιξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía en resorte</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the energy released by a spring when it is stretched.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ball</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Energie, die bis zum 
einem Frühling freigegeben wird, als sie ausgedehnt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'énergie libérée 
par un ressort où elle est étirée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a energia liberada por 
uma mola em que for esticada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'energia liberata 
entro una molla in cui è allungata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την ενέργεια που 
εκδίδεται από ένα ελατήριο όταν τεντώνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la energía 
release/versión por un resorte en que se estira.</string>
          </description>
